feature.label: Versatile Commodore Emulator (VICE)
feature.description: VICE is an emulator for Commodore 8-bit computers.
feature.copyright: The VICE is copyrighted to: Pottendo, Marco van den Heuvel, Fabrizio Gennari, Groepaz, Errol Smith, Ingo Korb, Olaf Seibert, Marcus Sutton, Kajtar Zsolt, AreaScout, Bas Wassink, Michael C.
